#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;
int ans[100002], a[100002];

int main()
{
	

	int t, n;
	int x;
	int i, j, k;
	float sum;
	
	sum = 0;
	ans[0] = 1;
	ans[1] = 1;
	for(i = 2; i <= 100002; i++) {
		
		sum= sum + log10(i);
		ans[i] = ceil(sum);
		
	}
	
	scanf("%d", &t);
	
	while(t--) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n);
		
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			
			scanf("%d", &x);
			cout << ans[x] << " ";
			
		}
		
		cout << endl;
		
	}
	
	return 0;
	
}
